001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.json;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.StringBuilderOut;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.TreeDumper;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.RenderSpec;
007
008import java.io.PrintStream;
009import java.util.ArrayDeque;
010import java.util.Deque;
011import java.util.Iterator;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Objects;
014
015/**
016 * Implementation of {@link TreeDumper} that dumps into the passed {@link PrintStream}
017 * the tree of a {@link Highlight.Structure#JSON JSON} logical structure
018 * in {@link Highlight.Target#SVG_ATTRS SVG-Attrs} target format (SVG-Class is coming soon).
019 */
020public class JsonSvgDumper implements TreeDumper {
021
022    final PrintStream out;
023    final RenderSpec renderSpec;
024    final Deque<String> currentPath = new ArrayDeque<>();
025
026    int totalRowCount = 0;
027    int currentRowLen = 0;
028    int maxRowLen = 0;
029
030    public JsonSvgDumper(PrintStream out, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
031        this.out = Objects.requireNonNull(out);
032        this.renderSpec = Objects.requireNonNull(renderSpec);
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public void acceptRoot(Node rootNode) {
037        PrintStream innerOut = StringBuilderOut.create();
038        JsonSvgDumper innerDumper = new JsonSvgDumper(innerOut, renderSpec);
039        rootNode.visit(innerDumper);
040        out.println(renderSpec.dumpOuterSvg(
041            innerOut.toString(), Highlight.Structure.JSON,
042            14, innerDumper.maxRowLen, innerDumper.totalRowCount));
043    }
044
045    private void addWidth(int delta) {
046        this.currentRowLen += delta;
047        this.maxRowLen = Math.max(this.maxRowLen, this.currentRowLen);
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public void acceptNull() {
052        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
053            out.print(svgRowStart());
054        }
055        out.print(renderSpec.highlightNullSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON));
056        addWidth(4); // <-- null
057        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
058            out.print(svgRowEnd());
059        }
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public void acceptScalar(ScalarNode scalarNode) {
064        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
065            out.print(svgRowStart());
066        }
067        out.print(doubleQuotes());
068        out.print(renderSpec.highlightValueSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, scalarNode.text()));
069        out.print(doubleQuotes());
070        addWidth(2 + scalarNode.text().length()); // <-- "value"
071        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
072            out.print(svgRowEnd());
073        }
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    public void acceptSequence(SequenceNode sequenceNode) {
078        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
079            out.print(svgRowStart());
080        }
081        out.print(openSquareBracket());
082        addWidth(1);
083        int count = 0;
084        Iterator<Node> itNode = sequenceNode.sequenceItems().iterator();
085        while (itNode.hasNext()) {
086            if (count > 0) {
087                out.print(comma());
088                addWidth(1);
089            }
090            count++;
091            currentPath.addLast(String.format("[%d]", count));
092            out.println(svgRowEnd());
093            out.print(svgRowStart() + indent());
094            addIndentWidth();
095            itNode.next().visit(this);
096            currentPath.removeLast();
097        }
098        if (count > 0) {
099            out.println(svgRowEnd());
100            out.print(svgRowStart() + indent());
101            addIndentWidth();
102        }
103        out.print(closedSquareBracket());
104        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
105            out.print(svgRowEnd());
106        }
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    public void acceptMappings(MappingsNode mappingsNode) {
111        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
112            out.print(svgRowStart());
113        }
114        out.print(openFigureBracket());
115        addWidth(1);
116        int count = 0;
117        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Node>> itEntry = mappingsNode.mappingsItems().iterator();
118        while (itEntry.hasNext()) {
119            Map.Entry<String, Node> entry = itEntry.next();
120            if (count > 0) {
121                out.print(comma());
122                addWidth(1);
123            }
124            count++;
125            currentPath.addLast(String.format("(%s)", entry.getKey()));
126            out.println(svgRowEnd());
127            out.print(svgRowStart() + indent());
128            addIndentWidth();
129            out.print(doubleQuotes());
130            out.print(renderSpec.highlightKeySvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, entry.getKey()));
131            out.print(doubleQuotes());
132            out.print(colonSpace());
133            addWidth(4 + entry.getKey().length());
134            entry.getValue().visit(this);
135            currentPath.removeLast();
136        }
137        if (count > 0) {
138            out.println(svgRowEnd());
139            out.print(svgRowStart() + indent());
140            addIndentWidth();
141        }
142        out.print(closedFigureBracket());
143        addWidth(1);
144        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
145            out.print(svgRowEnd());
146        }
147    }
148
149    private String svgRowStart() {
150        return String.format("""
151            <tspan class="json-svg-row json-svg-row-%d" x="0" dy="1.2em">""",
152            totalRowCount++
153        );
154    }
155
156    private String svgRowEnd() {
157        this.currentRowLen = 0;
158        return "</tspan>";
159    }
160
161    private String indent() {
162        return "  ".repeat(currentPath.size());
163    }
164
165    private void addIndentWidth() {
166        addWidth(2 * currentPath.size());
167    }
168
169    private String comma() {
170        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, ',');
171    }
172
173    private String colonSpace() {
174        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, ": ");
175    }
176
177    private String doubleQuotes() {
178        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '"');
179    }
180
181    private String openSquareBracket() {
182        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '[');
183    }
184
185    private String closedSquareBracket() {
186        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, ']');
187    }
188
189    private String openFigureBracket() {
190        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '{');
191    }
192
193    private String closedFigureBracket() {
194        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Highlight.Structure.JSON, '}');
195    }
196
197}
